content: You seem to be a typical government worshipper. Not surprising. The brain-washing (public schools) works pretty well. If ANYTHING the state does is threatening to ANYBODY’S livelihood, they have too much power. And they HAVE had too much power, since the day the ink dried on the US Constitution. And well before the US was even an idea. I consider the state, ANY state, to be my mortal enemy. I do not look to it for help, with ANYTHING. I just try to stay out of its way, and to live on the less than half of my income its extortion racket (taxation) lets me keep. And it works pretty well for me. I just keep getting happier. “If you’re not getting happier, as you get older, then you’re fuckin’ up.” — Ani DiFranco, If Yr Not But I was pretty angry about it when I first discovered that the state is a criminal organization. Used to the idea now. Just how it is. Life goes on.
